title: Add $0.49 IAP price point
body: I think that having and IAP price point of $0.49 could be wildly attractive to end users and get more purchases for developers. Having $0.99 as the bottom for things like ad removal, when many *full apps* cost $0.99 can sometimes be a tough sell.

comments.body: lower pricing options should be available for Indian currency if lower pricing of ₹10,₹20,₹30,₹40 is available then it will be beneficial for both developer as well as user. Because ₹55 is still much higher to pay for middle class Indian people.
